channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Goes to Stanford
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: still on track, and every day brings us closer to our first shipment!
item.content:encoded: still on track, and every day brings us closer to our first shipment!

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Cant wait until this ships. Hope the Mayfield team and Kuri are still on track to ship by the Holidays 2017. Keep up the great work and keep the improvements coming. Thank you
item.content:encoded: Cant wait until this ships. Hope the Mayfield team and Kuri are still on track to ship by the Holidays 2017. Keep up the great work and keep the improvements coming. Thank you
